channel.title: Times of India
channel.description: The Times of India: Breaking news, views, reviews, cricket from across India
channel.copyright: Copyright:(C) 2014 Bennett Coleman & Co. Ltd, http://info.indiatimes.com/terms/tou.html

item.title: Narendra Modi’s ‘Mausam’ manoeuvre to check China’s maritime might
item.description: India is all set to launch what is probably Narendra Modi’s most significant foreign policy initiative for countering Beijing’s growing influence in the Indian Ocean region.

item.title: New sense of excitement in India, Google’s Sundar Pichai says
item.description: Google's senior VP Sundar Pichai says, "India has always had potential but it’s now moving to have a big impact. The trends will only go in one direction from here."

item.title: J&K floods: Omar thanks Centre, says his govt will function from Thursday
item.description: Jammu & Kashmir chief minister Omar Abdullah thanked the central government for the support given to it during the floods, an official spokesman said.

item.title: Rs 2.67 crore reward on Maoist chief Ganpathi’s head
item.description: With various state governments increasing reward on CPI (Maoist) chief Mupalla Laxmana Rao alias Ganpathi, there is Rs 2.67 crore riding on his head, making him one of the most wanted in India.

item.title: Shia team to bring back Indians recruited by ISIS
item.description: A delegation of six members from Anjuman-e Haideri, a Shia committee from Delhi, will go to Iraq to provide help and appeal to Indian Muslims, who have allegedly joined ISIS, to come back.
